name: ESTATE OF Joseph E. CODY, Sr., an Incapacitated Person. Petition of Kelly Ann Cody, Original P.O.A. of Mr. Joseph E. Cody, Sr.

parties: ESTATE OF Joseph E. CODY, Sr., an Incapacitated Person. Petition of Kelly Ann Cody, Original P.O.A. of Mr. Joseph E. Cody, Sr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of October, 2011, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
31 A.3d 286
ESTATE OF Joseph E. CODY, Sr., an Incapacitated Person. Petition of Kelly Ann Cody, Original P.O.A. of Mr. Joseph E. Cody, Sr.
No. 55 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 18, 2011.
